section_title: UNFCCC TECHNICAL WORKSHOP UNDER THE NAIROBI WORK PROGRAMME:
sentences: The UNFCCC Technical Workshop on Increasing Economic Resilience to Climate Change and Reducing Reliance on Vulnerable Economic Sectors through Economic Diversification took place from 28-30 April 2009, in Cairo, Egypt.

The workshop was convened under the NWP at SBSTA s request with a view to promoting understanding, as well as the development and dissemination of measures, methodologies and tools for increasing economic resilience, including the understanding of social aspects.
